weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm made of frozen water.
⛄️ You can build a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when I fall.

weather.question: I help flowers grow and give you puddles to splash in. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come from clouds.
☔️ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌱 Plants need me to live.

weather.question: I am hot and bright and can make you sweat. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am in the sky.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🔥 I can make you feel very warm.

weather.question: I blow hard and can move the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I am air moving fast.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
🌬️ I can make your hair messy.

weather.question: I rumble and flash and sometimes bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡️ I am a loud noise.
⛈️ I happen during a storm.
💡 I am a bright light in the sky.

weather.question: I'm a big, white fluffy thing that floats in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like sheep.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.
🌧️ I can sometimes hold rain.

weather.question: I am water that is frozen in the air but smaller than snowflakes. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am very cold.
🌾 I look like tiny balls.
🤕 Ouch, if I hit you, it might hurt!

weather.question: I am cold and white, but I'm not snow. I'm frozen water on the ground.

hints.text: 🧤 You might see me early in the morning.
🌿 I cover the grass.
❄️ I'm made of ice crystals.

weather.question: I come after the rain, and I have many colors. You can see me in the sky.

hints.text: 🌈 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo and violet.
💧 I need the sun and rain to appear.
✨ Some people think there is a pot of gold at my end.

weather.question: I am a big storm with very strong winds that spin around. I form over the ocean.

hints.text: 🌀 I have an eye in the middle.
🌊 I can cause a lot of damage near the coast.
🛰️ Scientists track me from space.

animal.question: I say “Meow”, love to chase string, and drink milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink this from a bowl.
🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🐈‍⬛ People often have me as a pet.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to fetch a ball. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on this.
🎾 I love to play fetch.
🏡 I am a popular pet.

animal.question: I quack, swim in the water, and waddle when I walk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I like to eat seeds and grass.
🦆 I have webbed feet.
💦 I love to swim in ponds.

animal.question: I say “Moo”, give milk, and eat grass in a field. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 Baby one of these is called a calf.
🥛 People drink my milk.
🌱 I like to eat green things.

animal.question: I have a long trunk, big ears, and love peanuts. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat these.
🐘 I am very big and gray.
🌴 I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I roar, have a big mane, and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am the king of the jungle.
🦁 I am a cat, but a very big one.
🐾 You can see me in a zoo.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and run fast on the plains of Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look a little like a horse.
🦓 I wear a striped pajama.
🌍 I live in hot, grassy places.

animal.question: I hop, have big ears, and love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 This is my favourite food.
🐰 I am a small, furry animal.
🐇 I have long ears to help me listen.

animal.question: I spin a web, catch bugs, and have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕷️ I have lots of legs.
🕸️ I make a sticky trap.
🐛 I eat insects.

animal.question: I climb trees, eat bananas, and make funny faces. What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I love to peel and eat these yellow fruits.
🐒 I live in the jungle.
🙊 I like to swing from tree to tree.
